name: Kettlebell Lunge Clean to Press
description: Start in a lunge position holding a kettlebell. Clean it to the rack position while lunging forward, then press overhead as you drive back to standing. Combines three movements into one fluid chain â€” lunge, clean, press. Demands coordination, leg strength, and shoulder stability. Alternate sides each rep.

media.caption: 4 Kettlebell Lunge Variations for Athletic Performance
